alert.note: Alert for Hamblen (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:40PM CST until January 12 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EST FOR CENTRAL HAWKINS...WASHINGTON...EASTERN COCKE...GREENE...UNICOI AND EASTERN HAMBLEN COUNTIES... At 139 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rogersville to 10 miles southeast of Russellville to near Parrottsville to 6 miles north of Smoky Mountains-Big Creek, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated and public observed damage. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Greeneville, Erwin, Rogersville, Jonesborough, Tusculum, Parrottsville, Banner Hill and Midway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 13 and 23, and between mile markers 29 and 54. Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 450 and 451. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 18 and 52. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
